alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:38PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Accomack and Northampton Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Gwynn to 13 miles south of Cape Charles. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Exmore, Cape Charles, Onancock, Parksley, Onley, Nassawadox, Cheriton, Bay View, Willis Wharf, Accomac, Melfa, Bloxom, Eastville, Saxis, Wachapreague, Painter, Hallwood, Keller, Harborton and Franktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
